1.caption_en:
Infographic diagram of a three‑phase product lifecycle: "DISCOVER" → "LAUNCH" → "EXPAND", showing connected topic nodes like Market, Solution, Team, Ecosystem, Network Effects, Data and Infrastructure linked by dotted connectors and circular arrows.

{
  "type": "infographic",
  "title": "Discover - Launch - Expand product lifecycle",
  "description": "Three-phase horizontal diagram linking key topics and strategies across product stages with colored rounded nodes and dotted connectors.",
  "layout": {
    "orientation": "horizontal",
    "phases_order": ["DISCOVER", "LAUNCH", "EXPAND"],
    "visual_connectors": "dotted lines between nodes; circular arrows centered between phases"
  },
  "phases": [
    {
      "name": "DISCOVER",
      "position": "left",
      "nodes": [

        {"text": "Competition", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "top"},

        {"text": "SOLUTION", "role": "main_topic", "color": "orange", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "Unfair Advantage", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "bottom"}
      ]
    },
    {

        {"text": "TEAM", "role": "main_topic", "color": "orange", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "Governance", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "Trust", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "right"}
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "EXPAND",
      "position": "right",
      "nodes": [
        {"text": "Partnerships", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "top"},
        {"text": "ECOSYSTEM", "role": "main_topic", "color": "green", "position": "top"},

        {"text": "Data", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "CULTURE", "role": "main_topic", "color": "green", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "Infrastructure", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "bottom"},
        {"text": "Interactions", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "bottom-right"},
        {"text": "EXPERIENCE", "role": "main_topic", "color": "green", "position": "bottom-right"},
        {"text": "Communities", "role": "subtopic", "color": "teal", "position": "center-right"}
      ]
    }
